entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening then light overnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 8.
